column5: Well everyone, it's been an interesting year to say the least.  Lots of boat problems this year prevented me from fishing as frequently and put guiding to a halt.  I still got out lots and made lots of memories before calling it an early year. Here's a video recap of my season, enjoy!  http://youtu.be/NRVxKtBjl4A
Well done Steve ! Lots of quality fish for sure.
Thanks man, through all the frustrations of the season, quality fish make it all worth while.
Awesome season recap Steve as always   Lots of quality fish in that video
awesome video man, looks like a great 2012 for you! enjoyed it!

Great report Steve. Sorry to hear about your boat problems but we all know tons of guys who had no boat problems at all and didn't catch one tenth the quality fish you caught. Keep at it....you're an inspiration to lots of folks and thanks for sharing your 2012 recap.
Nice job Steve, looks like a great season.
